byline: Nancy Marshall-Genzer, Shannon Mullen, David Weinberg, Jeremy Hobson, Alice Walker, Will Oremus, Bruce Johnson, Karen Casey, Nigel Cassidy, David Gura and Julia Coronado
teaser: Just as France's government is aiming to grow its economy with tax cuts, Greece is looking trim its debts with public sector layoffs. We get to know a company that many may have never heard of, but almost certainly interact with on a daily basis -- AppNexus. And Italy grapples with a shortage of pizza-makers.
